@Tico135 wrote:

Although, this will not work. You need to make a command in-game to allow it to level up. Read the FAQ in the Development/Help section for more information.

item.source: How do i change players stats on my server?

item.title: How do i change players stats on my server?
item.dc:creator: @masterlop masterlop
item.description:
@masterlop wrote:

Go to your server’s folder, click on characters, then click on who evers stats you want to change, scroll down, you should see this.

character-skill = 0 1 0
character-skill = 1 1 0
character-skill = 2 1 0

just change the 1’s to 99 and the 0’s to 486000000 if you want to change your stats to 99.

Read full topic
